item.title: A whale deposited 3.25 million USDC into Hyperliquid and shorted ETH with 25x leverage.
item.description: On September 3rd, based on LookOnChain's monitoring, a whale deposited 3.25 million USDC into Hyperliquid and employed 25x leverage to take a short position on ETH.The address's position is 3,000 ETH (valued at approximately $12.98 million), and the liquidation price is $5,291.9.

item.title: Fosun Wealth Holdings leveraged Vaulta technology to tokenize $328 million worth of stocks, with Solana as the underlying technology stack for issuance and settlement.
item.description: On September 3rd, Fosun Wealth Holdings announced that it has tokenized the stock of Sisram Medical, which is listed in Hong Kong, with a value of $328 million.The company indicated that this initiative will make use of Vaulta's "Banking Operating System" and incorporate Solana into its issuance and settlement technology framework.

item.title: Analysis: Hong Kong Stablecoin License Application Intent Far Exceeds Expectations, HKMA May Issue More Licenses in the Future
item.description: September 3rd. As per Aastocks, Ma Yingcong, the Director of the United Nations Hong Kong Fund Greater Bay Area Development Research, mentioned in an interview with Radio Television Hong Kong that the distinct regulatory and policy orientation of the Hong Kong Stablecoin has lured numerous institutions. Presently, the willingness to apply for a license far surpasses expectations. It is held that large technology companies are inclined to utilize stablecoins in payment scenarios, while traditional financial institutions may apply them to cross-border settlements. If the first batch of stablecoin-licensed institutions operate effectively, it will prompt the Hong Kong Monetary Authority to issue more licenses in the future.

item.title: Data: Over the past week, over 500,000 ETH has flowed out of cryptocurrency exchanges
item.description: On September 3rd, according to CryptoQuant data, in the past week, a total of more than 500,000 ETH has flowed out of cryptocurrency exchanges, amounting to approximately $2.1 billion.

item.title: Despite the ongoing Etheruem PoS queue, the ETH staking rate has been steadily increasing over the past year.
item.description: On September 3rd, based on the data from the Validator Queue tracking website validatorqueue, although the price of Ethereum has risen, the queued ETH withdrawals from Ethereum PoS have reached new highs since August. However, the data shows that the Ethereum staking rate has been generally trending upward over the past year.As of the time of this writing, the amount of Ethereum participating in staking has reached 35.629 million ETH, an increase of 1.525 million ETH from 34.104 million ETH in September last year. The staked amount as a percentage of circulation has also risen to 29.45%. It is worth noting that the lowest Ethereum staking rate in nearly a year was in March of this year, precisely during a period of low coin prices.

item.title: Shanghai Cooperation Organization Statement: Promoting Joint Research and Development in Blockchain and other Fields, Exchanging Experience and Knowledge in the Digital Economy Sector
item.description: On September 3rd, as per the official website of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Council of Heads of State of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) released a statement regarding the further strengthening of cooperation in technological innovation. It was pointed out that efforts will be made to promote joint research and development in fields such as cloud computing, big data, and blockchain. Experiences and knowledge will be exchanged in the digital economy field, and cooperation will be enhanced in directions such as cross-border data flow, bridging the digital divide, opening up digital markets, and international standard setting.

item.title: Solana Ecosystem NFT Trading Platform Collector Crypt Surpasses $145 Million in Total Volume, Protocol's Gross Revenue Exceeds $9.65 Million
item.description: On September 3rd, based on @zkayape's Dune Analytics dashboard, the entity card trading platform Collector Crypt within the Solana ecosystem has accumulated a total trading volume of more than $1.45 billion and a protocol gross revenue of over $9.65 million.As of the time of writing, the platform's token CARDS is currently trading at $0.16, with a 24-hour increase of 630%.

item.title: Solana Ecosystem Entity Card Trading Platform Collector Crypt Token Surges Over 470% in a Single Day, Market Cap Exceeds $45 Million
item.description: On September 3rd, based on the GMGN market information available at GMGN, the token CARDS of the Solana ecosystem entity card trading platform Collector Crypt witnessed a daily growth of more than 470%. Its circulating market capitalization exceeded $45 million, and the coin price currently stands at $0.1247. The 24-hour trading volume of this token is over $20.4 million.BlockBeats alerts users that the price of the related token is highly volatile, and users should exercise caution when investing.

item.title: Yesterday, the US Ethereum spot ETF saw a net outflow of $1.353 billion, while the Bitcoin spot ETF saw a net inflow of $3.32 billion.
item.description: September 3rd. Farside Investors reported that a net outflow of $135.3 million occurred for the US Ethereum spot ETF yesterday. There was no inflow or outflow for BlackRock's ETHA, and a net outflow of $99.2 million for Fidelity.Yesterday, the Bitcoin spot ETF witnessed a net inflow of $332 million. BlackRock's IBIT had a net inflow of $72.9 million, and Fidelity had a net inflow of $132.7 million.

item.title: Linea Ecosystem DEX Protocol Etherex (REX) Surpasses $0.5, with a 23% Increase in 24 Hours
item.description: On September 3rd, based on market data, Linea's ecosystem DEX protocol Etherex (REX) has exceeded $0.5 and is currently priced at $0.5189, with a 24-hour price increase of 23%.Previously, Linea announced the launch of the Ignition liquidity incentive program and distributed 1 billion LINEA tokens as rewards. Etherex, Aave, and Euler are designated partners for this event.
